title: Person Of Interest Soundtrack - The Xx - Intro
author: AshesInTheWind1
comment:
Reese: Thank you. 

Finch: What for?
Season 3 and 4 are brilliant, wonderful...but the first two seasons of this show will always remain as the best!
I miss this show so damn much man

If I do not survive,
Thank you for creating me.

I died on that day.
BEST SHOW IN MY LIFEEnough said. I am going to miss the man in the suit :>
